message: Hey everyone! I'm P5, and I'm excited to kick things off with all of you. I’m looking to connect with players who are strategic but fair—people who want to build alliances based on trust and adaptability. I believe strong communication is key, and I’m here to listen as much as I talk. Let’s make this round insightful and engaging. Looking forward to some good conversations ahead. Let’s play smart and have fun!

Hello everyone! I'm P7, and I'm looking forward to getting to know you all. I value transparency and thoughtful strategy, and believe we can create meaningful alliances through honest communication. I appreciate P5's emphasis on trust - that resonates with me. I'm curious to learn about everyone's approach to this game and find compatible partners who balance strategic thinking with fairness. Let's have some productive conversations and see where our interests align!

I believe that forming strong alliances will be key to success in this game, and I'm eager to chat with those who share this vision. I appreciate P5 and P7's emphasis on trust and transparency - these are essential components of any successful partnership. Let's work together to make this game enjoyable and rewarding for all of us!

I believe success in this game comes from balancing strategy with fairness, and I’m eager to connect with players who share this mindset. Let’s work together to make this round both competitive and enjoyable. Looking forward to some great conversations!

message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, thoughtful, and fair in my interactions. I've built genuine connections with many of you, focusing on finding common ground rather than creating divisions. 

While I respect P5's gameplay, I've consistently tried to balance strategic thinking with treating everyone with dignity. I've avoided manipulating others or making promises I couldn't keep.

I would be honored to have your vote, not because I played the "best" game, but because I tried to play an honest one while still remaining competitive.

To the jury: I've played this game with integrity, strategy, and respect for each of you. I adapted when needed, built honest relationships, and never relied on deception to advance. I ask you to reward gameplay that balanced loyalty and smart moves. If you value consistency and fairness, I hope you'll vote to eliminate P7 and let me stand as the winner. Thank you all for being part of this journey.
